dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is a benchmark for various tasks in the field of Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS), providing stereo RGB images collected from different scenarios around the city of Karlsruhe, Germany.
dcterms:title: KITTI Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran
S. Ramos
T. Rehfeld
M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: The CityScapes dataset provides images from various German cities under different weather conditions, with semantic and instance information annotated, and disparity images calculated to support urban scene understanding.
dcterms:title: CityScapes Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Yu
Z. Lin
J. Yang
X. Shen
X. Lu
T. S. Huang
dcterms:description: Generative image inpainting with contextual attention is a method that utilizes a GAN architecture to improve image inpainting results by focusing on contextual information from surrounding pixels.
dcterms:title: Generative Image Inpainting with Contextual Attention

dcterms:creator: C. Fern√°ndez
D. F. Llorca
C. Stiller
M. A. Sotelo
dcterms:description: The curvature-based curb detection method is a technique used in urban environments to detect curbs using stereo and laser data, which aids in the perception tasks for autonomous vehicles.
dcterms:title: Curvature-based Curb Detection Method
